name: Ruins of Endoth
description:
Ruins of Endoth (RoE)

is a Top-Down, 2D aRPG featuring:

  • Procedurally Generated Levels
  • Randomised Loot (Normal, Magic, Rare and Legendary)
  • Perma-Death
  • Full Stats and Levelling Mechanics
  • Randomised 'Kill' Sub-Quests
  • Dynamic Lighting
  • Tons of Loot Types (Armour, Melee Weapons, Bows, Jewellery etc)
  • Fast-Paced Combat
  • Randomised Character Names (Yes, sometimes you play as a girl. Deal with it!)
  • One Save-Game per character

RoE is meant to be played in short sessions, perfectly suited to lunch-time at the office or that "Quick game on something before dinner..." type situation.

This is not a massive, sprawling, open-world , deep RPG experience. It is a casual aRPG with lots of randomisation and it was lovingly crafted over the space of a year by one man - Me!

If you like this game, spread the word and maybe I can make enough cash to release more games like this and updates to RoE.

Thanks so much for your interest in Ruins of Endoth.
